mapper.select: select tm.tm_seq, tm.team_seq, tm.applicant, tm_date, tm.confirm_yn, ui.user_icon, ui.user_nick, (select user_id from team_info where team_seq=#{team_seq}) as team_admin from team_member tm, user_info ui where tm.applicant = ui.user_id and team_seq = #{team_seq}
mapper.delete: delete from team_member where applicant = #{applicant} and team_seq = #{team_seq}
mapper.update: update team_member set confirm_yn = 'y' where applicant = #{applicant} and team_seq = #{team_seq}
update user_info set user_favor = user_favor+1 where user_id = #{applicant}
